response: Gender roles should be strictly defined with clear boundaries; men excel in leadership and decision-making roles due to their nature, while women excel in nurturing and supportive roles. It is essential to recognize these differences and work together in harmony. Diversity in workplaces can help foster an environment where everyone contributes based on innate abilities rather than external expectations.
